data.title: Refrigeration and freezing product segment
data.meta_description: The Domestic Appliances Product Division manufactures refrigerators and freezers in four countries for private and commercial use. The division control
data.text:
Advanced cooling technology and modern design

Innovative ideas, modern design and clever solutions for easy handling characterise the products in the Refrigeration and Freezing product segment. In order to be optimally prepared for continuous 24-hour use everyday, the focus is always on the customer needs in the development of all appliances. The broad product portfolio of freestanding and built-in appliances is characterised by formidable energy efficiency and smart features. The portfolio is rounded off with a large selection of wine storage and multi-temperature wine cabinets and humidors.

Liebherr offers all benefits that really matter for refrigerating and freezer units in this area for professional use in trade and commerce, as well as in labs and the medical industry: Apart from efficient cooling capacity and reliable temperature stability, the appliances impress with a low energy demand and maximum efficiency. Liebherr refrigerating and freezer units are considered a symbol of top quality in the industry and by customers â€“ in Europe and beyond. Just under 2.3 million refrigerating and freezer units are manufactured every year at the five production sites.

Five production sites

Liebherr manufactured the first refrigerating and freezer units in 1954. Today the company manufactures the appliances in five countries: Germany, Austria, Bulgaria, Malaysia and India.
